title: Weirdest bug with Sion
body:
Ok so I was playing Sion top in a ranked game. Throughout the lane phase, the attempting to reconnect logo pops up, even though I'm on 40 ping, can move and use abilities fine, net still working. I hit 6, use my ult, then instantly drop from the game. I currently am unable to reconnect, getting the firewall message (which is Bullsh*t). What is going on?

EDIT: After hitting reconnect a billion times it finally gave me a different message. The game you are trying to connect to has ended, hit ok to continue to the homepage. I didn't lose any LP, no match history or recently played with or anything recorded of that game existing. The game was only like 10 minutes in as well, before surrender time.

replies.body: That wasn't a Sion bug, the OCE servers had maintenance and this is a result of that.
Went to replay, as soon as is starts says game ended with no result.
if it wasnt recorded then maybe its just all in your head :^)
